sub_title: Production Manager at Yeast Factory Delft DSM
summary: Currently working as a project manager for many improvements on the area of manufacturing. I like to work on the interface of complicated data mining and collaboration with people through all layers and disciplines. As a young professional I am eager to keep on developing myself and learn as much as possible by doing with a hands on mentality.

education.field_of_study: Active Listening and Assess Behavior and Ask relevant Questions

projects.title: DSM MATCH Business Course
projects.description: Organizing a 2 yearly business course for DSM (Europe). During this business course master and PhD students will follow a 6 day program where they will visit several production sites of DSM within Switzerland, France and the Netherlands. During these visits they will enjoy site tours, cultural presentations and meet many important stakeholders on site. On the other hand they will have to collaborate in different teams so DSM can test how they perform in difficult case studies. By the end of the week well performing students will be able to react on internal vacancies.

profile_positions.description: Leading production organization (70+ FTE) of yeast factory in Delft. Plant runs 24/7 with 5-shift teams.
profile_positions.title: Production Manager

profile_positions.description: Leading dayshift production team that manages production performance and coaches/assists the 5-shift teams. Responsible for analysing and improving the performance of the fermentation factory to make yeast for yeast extract, nathamycin factory and utilities. Main focus on rate, right first time and infection prevention. Secondairy activity in resolving issues with short and mid term solutions in and around the factory.
profile_positions.title: Plant Performance Engineer

profile_positions.description: Leading competence improvement program for business group DSM Food Specialties (DFS). This includes building up a new network, introducing a new hygiene training and collecting and sharing more of best practices used at all sites.
profile_positions.title: Business Group Hygiene Champion

profile_positions.description:
-Project manager/director in strategic projects concerning capacity improvements, cost reduction and innovation 
-Interact between Cultures production sites and R&D department
-Review the Operations Strategy of Enzymes business
-Safeguarding Production Support budget of R&D as portfolio manager
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Manufacturing at DSM Food Specialties

profile_positions.description:
Starting my career as a new employee within DSM Business Unit Cultures (part of Business Group DSM Food Specialties). Working within the department of Manufacturing assisting or managing several global projects. 

Examples of processes and tasks are:
-Identify Capacity and Yield losses
-Built up new portfolio management of Production Support budget of R&D
-Writing business cases for new opportunities
-Develop long term production strategy (Business Operations Strategy)
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer at DSM Food Specialties

profile_positions.description:
Melis Bierproeverijen is all about having a good time with beer! We organize events for small and large groups where beer tasting is the central activity. Think about birthday or bachelor parties, team events or just for fun with your neighbors.

Together with the customer we arrange a wide variety of tasting ideas. These can be themed around countries, beer styles or food pairing. Go to our website to learn more.
